ygData.subject: RE: SV: [EverQuest] EverQuest Networking Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Here in France dowtimes happen exactly between 15 PM and 22 PM (most of the time 23 PM). Which means we can t play at all in the evening, and we only have
ygData.messageBody:
Here in France dowtimes happen exactly between 15 PM and 22 PM (most of the
time 23 PM). Which means we can't play at all in the evening, and we only have
evenings to play. But I think it is a good thing that they update the servers.



> We pay monthly for them to keep the servers up if we did not pay we
> could
> not play. the don't call it pay to play for nothing). And this is the
> internet so of course stuff is goona mess up. oh and Downtime starting
> at
> 7am tomorrow for 6 hours. Reic Morrel-Thule server
>
